Author: Aireil
Name: FF Logs Viewer
Description: View FF Logs ranking percentiles in-game. Add a context menu to open someone's logs. Layout, style, stats, default metric, and more are all customizable in the settings.
Punchline: View FF Logs ranking percentiles in-game.
Changelog:
- 2.1.7.3:
   Update default layout with savage.
- 2.1.7.2:
   Update default layout with normal as a swapped.
   Hopefully fix shaking issues that may happen on tables.
- 2.1.7.1:
   Update default layout for DT.
   Add support for PCT and VPR.
- 2.1.7.0:
   Dawntrail update.
